        Description copied from interface: Animation
        Renders this animation at the given position with specified dimensions.
        Specified by:
        render in interface Animation
        Parameters:
        batch - the batch to use in order to render this animation
        x - the horizontal position of this animation on the screen
        y - the vertical position of this animation on the screen
        width - the width in pixel of this animation
        height - the height in pixel of this animation
        delta - the current frame delta
